trans-unit.source: Expose <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The element associated with this automation peer.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified item.

An object that is in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified item.

Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> enumeration value.

Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.

The collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the class name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
"RibbonGallery" in all cases.

Gets the text that describes the functionality of the control <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>.

The text that describes the functionality of the control <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer"></xref>.
A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is the , , , or value; otherwise, .
Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider requires at least one child element to be selected.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
Retrieves a UI Automation provider for each child element that is selected.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for each child element that is selected.
Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider requires at least one child element to be selected.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
